grimmsnarl.name: grimmsnarl
grimmsnarl.description:
By transforming its leg hair, this Pokémon delivers
power-packed drill kicks that can bore huge
holes in Galar’s terrain.

eiscue.name: eiscue
eiscue.description:
It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a
frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to
make sure it stays nice and cold.

mr-rime.name: mr-rime
mr-rime.description:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.

runerigus.name: runerigus
runerigus.description:
A powerful curse was woven into an ancient
painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask,
the painting began to move.

milcery.name: milcery
milcery.description:
This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling
particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

alcremie.name: alcremie
alcremie.description:
Cream pours endlessly from this Pokémon’s body.
The cream stiffens when compressed by an
impact. A harder impact results in harder cream.

falinks.name: falinks
falinks.description:
Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass.
The brass’s orders are absolute.

pincurchin.name: pincurchin
pincurchin.description:
It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it
off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of
its spines.

snom.name: snom
snom.description:
It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of
energy and uses it to tie its body to branches,
disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.

toxtricity.name: toxtricity
toxtricity.description:
Capable of generating 15,000 volts of
electricity, this Pokémon looks down on
all that would challenge it.

frosmoth.name: frosmoth
frosmoth.description:
Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies
over fields and mountains. The temperature of its
wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.

stonjourner.name: stonjourner
stonjourner.description:
It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent
from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent
for delivering dynamic kicks.

obstagoon.name: obstagoon
obstagoon.description:
Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon
has a tendency to take on a threatening posture
and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

morpeko.name: morpeko
morpeko.description:
As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like
pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its
constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.

cufant.name: cufant
cufant.description:
It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very
strong, being able to carry loads of over
five tons without any problem at all.

copperajah.name: copperajah
copperajah.description:
So much power is packed within its trunk that if it
were to unleash that power, the resulting blast
could level mountains and change the landscape.

dracozolt.name: dracozolt
dracozolt.description:
In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its
powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway
after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

arctozolt.name: arctozolt
arctozolt.description:
The shaking of its freezing upper half is what
generates its electricity. It has a hard time
walking around.

dracovish.name: dracovish
dracovish.description:
Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator
of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was
what drove it to extinction.

arctovish.name: arctovish
arctovish.description:
Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its
surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey
afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

duraludon.name: duraludon
duraludon.description:
Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both
lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that
it rusts easily.

dreepy.name: dreepy
dreepy.description:
After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon,
Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit
back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

drakloak.name: drakloak
drakloak.description:
It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph.
It battles alongside Dreepy and
dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

dragapult.name: dragapult
dragapult.description:
When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the
holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches
the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

zacian.name: zacian
zacian.description:
Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon
absorbs metal particles, transforming them
into a weapon it uses to battle.

zamazenta.name: zamazenta
zamazenta.description:
In times past, it worked together with a king of
the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs
metal that it then uses in battle.

eternatus.name: eternatus
eternatus.description:
As a result of Rose’s meddling, Eternatus
absorbed all the energy in the Galar region.
It’s now in a state of power overload.

kubfu.name: kubfu
kubfu.description:
Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves
it masters will determine which form it takes when
it evolves.

urshifu.name: urshifu
urshifu.description:
As it waits for the right moment to unleash its
Gigantamax power, this Pokémon maintains a
perfect one-legged stance. It won’t even twitch.

zarude.name: zarude
zarude.description:
This Zarude left its pack to raise a human child.
The cloth Zarude would wrap the child with has a
comforting scent that calmed the child’s crying.

regieleki.name: regieleki
regieleki.description: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It's said that removing the rings on Regieleki's body will unleash the Pokémon's latent power.

regidrago.name: regidrago
regidrago.description: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago's arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.

glastrier.name: glastrier
glastrier.description: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.

spectrier.name: spectrier
spectrier.description: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn't use its sense of sight. Spectrier's kicks are said to separate soul from body.

calyrex.name: calyrex
calyrex.description: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

morgrem.name: morgrem
morgrem.description:
When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for
forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so
that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

impidimp.name: impidimp
impidimp.description:
Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations
produced by people and Pokémon when they
feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

hatterene.name: hatterene
hatterene.description:
It emits psychic power strong enough to cause
headaches as a deterrent to the approach
of others.

melmetal.name: melmetal
melmetal.description:
At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and
fall apart. The small shards left behind will
eventually be reborn as Meltan.

greedent.name: greedent
greedent.description:
It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that
they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit
slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

hattrem.name: hattrem
hattrem.description:
No matter who you are, if you bring strong
emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence
you violently.

hatenna.name: hatenna
hatenna.description:
Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other
creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm
disposition, it will never warm up to you.

polteageist.name: polteageist
polteageist.description:
This species lives in antique teapots.
Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions,
an authentic work is found.

sirfetchd.name: sirfetchd
sirfetchd.description:
Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles
can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s
leek withers, it will retire from combat.

indeedee.name: indeedee
indeedee.description:
It uses the horns on its head to sense the
emotions of others. Males will act as valets for
those they serve, looking after their every need.

cursola.name: cursola
cursola.description:
Its shell is overflowing with its heightened
otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as
protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.

venusaur.name: venusaur
venusaur.description:
In battle, this Pokémon swings around two thick
vines. If these vines slammed into a 10-story
building, they could easily topple it.

charizard.name: charizard
charizard.description:
It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders.
It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

blastoise.name: blastoise
blastoise.description:
It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause
fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

butterfree.name: butterfree
butterfree.description:
Crystallized Gigantamax energy makes up this
Pokémon’s blindingly bright and highly
toxic scales.

pikachu.name: pikachu
pikachu.description:
Its Gigantamax power expanded, forming its
supersized body and towering tail.

meowth.name: meowth
meowth.description:
It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good
mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look
at its hoard of treasures.

machamp.name: machamp
machamp.description:
It quickly swings its four arms to rock its
opponents with ceaseless punches and chops
from all angles.

gengar.name: gengar
gengar.description:
On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on
their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

kingler.name: kingler
kingler.description:
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower
strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy
to move.

lapras.name: lapras
lapras.description:
A smart and kindhearted Pokémon,
it glides across the surface of the sea while
its beautiful song echoes around it.

eevee.name: eevee
eevee.description:
Gigantamax energy upped the fluffiness of the
fur around Eevee’s neck. The fur will envelop a
foe, capturing its body and captivating its mind.

snorlax.name: snorlax
snorlax.description:
Gigantamax energy has affected stray seeds and
even pebbles that got stuck to Snorlax, making
them grow to a huge size.

garbodor.name: garbodor
garbodor.description:
Due to Gigantamax energy, this Pokémon’s toxic
gas has become much thicker, congealing into
masses shaped like discarded toys.

rillaboom.name: rillaboom
rillaboom.description:
By drumming, it taps into the power of its special
tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its
direction in battle.

cinderace.name: cinderace
cinderace.description:
Infused with Cinderace’s fighting spirit, the
gigantic Pyro Ball never misses its targets and
completely roasts opponents.

grookey.name: grookey
grookey.description:
When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat,
the sound waves produced carry revitalizing
energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

meltan.name: meltan
meltan.description:
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid
metal within its body is how it generates energy.

thwackey.name: thwackey
thwackey.description:
The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm
with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from
its peers.

scorbunny.name: scorbunny
scorbunny.description:
A warm-up of running around gets fire energy
coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that
happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.

raboot.name: raboot
raboot.description:
Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold
and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

sobble.name: sobble
sobble.description:
When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack
the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers
won’t be able to resist weeping.

drizzile.name: drizzile
drizzile.description:
A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using
water balloons created with moisture secreted
from its palms.

inteleon.name: inteleon
inteleon.description:
Gigantamax Inteleon’s Water Gun move fires at
Mach 7. As the Pokémon takes aim, it uses the
crest on its head to gauge wind and temperature.

skwovet.name: skwovet
skwovet.description:
Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon
becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely
empty of berries.

perrserker.name: perrserker
perrserker.description:
What appears to be an iron helmet is actually
hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill
of battle.

rookidee.name: rookidee
rookidee.description:
It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter
how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every
battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

corvisquire.name: corvisquire
corvisquire.description:
Smart enough to use tools in battle, these
Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and
flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

corviknight.name: corviknight
corviknight.description:
Imbued with Gigantamax energy, its wings can
whip up winds more forceful than any a hurricane
could muster. The gusts blow everything away.

blipbug.name: blipbug
blipbug.description:
A constant collector of information, this Pokémon
is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.

dottler.name: dottler
dottler.description:
It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its
shell without food or water seems to have
awakened its psychic powers.

orbeetle.name: orbeetle
orbeetle.description:
Its brain has grown to a gargantuan size, as has
the rest of its body. This Pokémon’s intellect and
psychic abilities are overpowering.

nickit.name: nickit
nickit.description:
Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids
the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off
its ill-gotten gains.

thievul.name: thievul
thievul.description:
It secretly marks potential targets with a scent.
By following the scent, it stalks its targets
and steals from them when they least expect it.

sandaconda.name: sandaconda
sandaconda.description:
Its sand pouch has grown to tremendous
proportions. More than 1,000,000 tons of sand
now swirl around its body.

eldegoss.name: eldegoss
eldegoss.description:
The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of
nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that
plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

wooloo.name: wooloo
wooloo.description:
Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that
this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right
back up at the bottom, unharmed.

dubwool.name: dubwool
dubwool.description:
Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end
up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll
start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

chewtle.name: chewtle
chewtle.description:
Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to
snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

drednaw.name: drednaw
drednaw.description:
It responded to Gigantamax energy by becoming
bipedal. First it comes crashing down on foes,
and then it finishes them off with its massive jaws.

yamper.name: yamper
yamper.description:
This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog
in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates
electricity from the base of its tail.

boltund.name: boltund
boltund.description:
This Pokémon generates electricity and channels
it into its legs to keep them going strong.
Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

rolycoly.name: rolycoly
rolycoly.description:
Most of its body has the same composition as
coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered
in coal mines about 400 years ago.

carkol.name: carkol
carkol.description:
It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by
this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of
people in the Galar region.

coalossal.name: coalossal
coalossal.description:
Its body is a colossal stove. With Gigantamax
energy stoking the fire, this Pokémon’s flame
burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

applin.name: applin
applin.description:
It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides
from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by
pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.

flapple.name: flapple
flapple.description:
It ate a sour apple, and that induced its
evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid
capable of causing chemical burns.

appletun.name: appletun
appletun.description:
Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution.
A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in
the bug Pokémon it preys on.

silicobra.name: silicobra
silicobra.description:
As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its
neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than
17 pounds of sand.

cramorant.name: cramorant
cramorant.description:
Cramorant’s gluttony led it to try to swallow an
Arrokuda whole, which in turn led to Cramorant
getting an Arrokuda stuck in its throat.

arrokuda.name: arrokuda
arrokuda.description:
If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon
charges for it straightaway, leading with its
sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.

barraskewda.name: barraskewda
barraskewda.description:
This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear
and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s
flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

toxel.name: toxel
toxel.description:
It stores poison in an internal poison sac and
secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch
this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

sizzlipede.name: sizzlipede
sizzlipede.description:
It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to
generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly
get particularly hot.

centiskorch.name: centiskorch
centiskorch.description:
Gigantamax energy has evoked a rise in its body
temperature, now reaching over 1,800 degrees
Fahrenheit. Its heat waves incinerate its enemies.

clobbopus.name: clobbopus
clobbopus.description:
It’s very curious, but its means of investigating
things is to try to punch them with its tentacles.
The search for food is what brings it onto land.

grapploct.name: grapploct
grapploct.description:
A body made up of nothing but muscle makes
the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with
its tentacles tremendously powerful.

sinistea.name: sinistea
sinistea.description:
The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is
its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses
its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.

gossifleur.name: gossifleur
gossifleur.description:
It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg,
then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough
sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

bulbasaur.name: bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description:
There is a plant seed on its back right from the
day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly
grows larger.

ivysaur.name: ivysaur
ivysaur.description:
When the bulb on its back grows large, it
appears to lose the ability to stand on its
hind legs.

charmander.name: charmander
charmander.description:
It has a preference for hot things. When it rains,
steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

charmeleon.name: charmeleon
charmeleon.description:
It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its
fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

squirtle.name: squirtle
squirtle.description:
When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it
squirts out water with vigorous force.

wartortle.name: wartortle
wartortle.description:
It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its
shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

caterpie.name: caterpie
caterpie.description:
For protection, it releases a horrible stench from
the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

metapod.name: metapod
metapod.description:
It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this
stage, it can only harden, so it remains
motionless to avoid attack.

weedle.name: weedle
weedle.description:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

kakuna.name: kakuna
kakuna.description:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

beedrill.name: beedrill
beedrill.description:
Flies at high
speed and attacks
using its large venomous stingers
on its forelegs
and tail.

pidgey.name: pidgey
pidgey.description:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

pidgeotto.name: pidgeotto
pidgeotto.description:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

pidgeot.name: pidgeot
pidgeot.description:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

rattata.name: rattata
rattata.description:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

raticate.name: raticate
raticate.description:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

spearow.name: spearow
spearow.description:
Eats bugs in
grassy areas. It
has to flap its short wings at
high speed to
stay airborne.

fearow.name: fearow
fearow.description:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

ekans.name: ekans
ekans.description:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

arbok.name: arbok
arbok.description:
It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.

pichu.name: pichu
pichu.description:
Despite its small size, it can zap even adult
humans. However, if it does so, it also
surprises itself.

raichu.name: raichu
raichu.description:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

sandshrew.name: sandshrew
sandshrew.description:
It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas.
By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt
and moisture clinging to its body.

sandslash.name: sandslash
sandslash.description:
It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through
deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this
Sandslash is faster than any other Pokémon.

nidoran-f.name: nidoran-f
nidoran-f.description:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

nidorina.name: nidorina
nidorina.description:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

nidoqueen.name: nidoqueen
nidoqueen.description:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

nidoran-m.name: nidoran-m
nidoran-m.description:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

nidorino.name: nidorino
nidorino.description:
An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

nidoking.name: nidoking
nidoking.description:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.

cleffa.name: cleffa
cleffa.description:
According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen
in places where shooting stars have fallen.

clefairy.name: clefairy
clefairy.description:
It is said that happiness will come to those who
see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a
full moon.

clefable.name: clefable
clefable.description:
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will
run and hide the moment it senses people.

vulpix.name: vulpix
vulpix.description:
After long years in the ever-snowcapped
mountains of Alola, this Vulpix has gained
power over ice.

ninetales.name: ninetales
ninetales.description:
A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this
Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped
as that deity’s incarnation.

igglybuff.name: igglybuff
igglybuff.description:
Igglybuff loves to sing. Its marshmallow-like body
gives off a faint sweet smell.

jigglypuff.name: jigglypuff
jigglypuff.description:
Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by
comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop
singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.

wigglytuff.name: wigglytuff
wigglytuff.description:
The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If
opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate
itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.

zubat.name: zubat
zubat.description:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

golbat.name: golbat
golbat.description:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

crobat.name: crobat
crobat.description:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

oddish.name: oddish
oddish.description:
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move.
It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

gloom.name: gloom
gloom.description:
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor.
The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance
of 1.25 miles.

vileplume.name: vileplume
vileplume.description:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

bellossom.name: bellossom
bellossom.description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

paras.name: paras
paras.description:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

parasect.name: parasect
parasect.description:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

venonat.name: venonat
venonat.description:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

venomoth.name: venomoth
venomoth.description:
The dust-like
scales covering
its wings are color coded to
indicate the kinds
of poison it has.

diglett.name: diglett
diglett.description:
If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil
perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

dugtrio.name: dugtrio
dugtrio.description:
A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge
earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

persian.name: persian
persian.description:
Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you
takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the
moment it gets annoyed.

psyduck.name: psyduck
psyduck.description:
Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the
Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently
the pain subsides for a while.

golduck.name: golduck
golduck.description:
This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It
paddles through the water with its long limbs,
putting its graceful swimming skills on display.

mankey.name: mankey
mankey.description:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

primeape.name: primeape
primeape.description:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

growlithe.name: growlithe
growlithe.description:
It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly
stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

arcanine.name: arcanine
arcanine.description:
The sight of it running over 6,200 miles
in a single day and night has captivated
many people.

poliwag.name: poliwag
poliwag.description:
For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking.
The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of
the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

poliwhirl.name: poliwhirl
poliwhirl.description:
Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness.
This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of
lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

poliwrath.name: poliwrath
poliwrath.description:
Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through
cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to
smash through drift ice and plow forward.

politoed.name: politoed
politoed.description:
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores
of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by
letting out cries that sound like shouting.

abra.name: abra
abra.description:
This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it
sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the
powers that the Pokémon wields.

kadabra.name: kadabra
kadabra.description:
Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it
sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

alakazam.name: alakazam
alakazam.description:
It has an incredibly high level of intelligence.
Some say that Alakazam remembers everything
that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

machop.name: machop
machop.description:
Its whole body is composed of muscles.
Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can
hurl 100 grown-ups.

machoke.name: machoke
machoke.description:
Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a
power-save belt to be able to regulate
its motions.

bellsprout.name: bellsprout
bellsprout.description:
Even though its body is extremely
skinny, it is blindingly fast
when catching its prey.

weepinbell.name: weepinbell
weepinbell.description:
It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

victreebel.name: victreebel
victreebel.description:
Said to live in
huge colonies
deep in jungles, although no one
has ever returned
from there.

tentacool.name: tentacool
tentacool.description:
Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer.
It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it
searches for prey.

tentacruel.name: tentacruel
tentacruel.description:
When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow
brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to
fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

geodude.name: geodude
geodude.description:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

graveler.name: graveler
graveler.description:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

golem.name: golem
golem.description:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

ponyta.name: ponyta
ponyta.description:
It can’t run properly when it’s newly born.
As it races around with others of its kind,
its legs grow stronger.

rapidash.name: rapidash
rapidash.description:
Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed
from this Pokémon’s horn, the move will punch
a hole right through a thick metal sheet.

slowpoke.name: slowpoke
slowpoke.description:
Although this Pokémon is normally zoned out,
its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion.
The cause for this seems to lie in Slowpoke’s diet.

slowbro.name: slowbro
slowbro.description:
A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with
the spices inside Slowbro’s body, causing
Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon.

slowking.name: slowking
slowking.description:
Miraculously, this former Slowpoke’s latent
intelligence was drawn out when Shellder poison
raced through its brain.

magnemite.name: magnemite
magnemite.description:
At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and
ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a
grounded Magnemite, it’ll start moving again.

magneton.name: magneton
magneton.description:
This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have
linked together. Magneton sends out powerful
radio waves to study its surroundings.

magnezone.name: magnezone
magnezone.description:
Some say that Magnezone receives signals from
space via the antenna on its head and that it’s
being controlled by some mysterious being.

farfetchd.name: farfetchd
farfetchd.description:
The Farfetch’d of the Galar region are brave
warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks
in battle.

doduo.name: doduo
doduo.description:
A bird that makes
up for its poor
flying with its fast foot speed.
Leaves giant
footprints.

dodrio.name: dodrio
dodrio.description:
Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.

seel.name: seel
seel.description:
The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

dewgong.name: dewgong
dewgong.description:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

grimer.name: grimer
grimer.description:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

muk.name: muk
muk.description:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

shellder.name: shellder
shellder.description:
It swims facing backward by opening and closing
its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

cloyster.name: cloyster
cloyster.description:
Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered,
even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it
is attacking.

gastly.name: gastly
gastly.description:
Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed
by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

haunter.name: haunter
haunter.description:
Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim
starts shaking constantly until death
eventually comes.

onix.name: onix
onix.description:
As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many
hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

steelix.name: steelix
steelix.description:
It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years,
its composition changes to become diamond-like.

drowzee.name: drowzee
drowzee.description:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

hypno.name: hypno
hypno.description:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

krabby.name: krabby
krabby.description:
It can be found near the sea. The large pincers
grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

voltorb.name: voltorb
voltorb.description:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

electrode.name: electrode
electrode.description:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

exeggcute.name: exeggcute
exeggcute.description:
Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs,
it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates
with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

exeggutor.name: exeggutor
exeggutor.description:
Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form
and powers of this Pokémon.

cubone.name: cubone
cubone.description:
When the memory of its departed mother brings
it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the
skull it wears on its head.

marowak.name: marowak
marowak.description:
This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a
sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents
bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

tyrogue.name: tyrogue
tyrogue.description:
It is always bursting with energy. To make itself
stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

hitmonlee.name: hitmonlee
hitmonlee.description:
This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of
balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

hitmonchan.name: hitmonchan
hitmonchan.description:
Its punches slice the air. They are launched at
such high speed, even a slight graze could cause
a burn.

hitmontop.name: hitmontop
hitmontop.description:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high
speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

lickitung.name: lickitung
lickitung.description:
If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and
you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in.
The itch won’t go away, either.

lickilicky.name: lickilicky
lickilicky.description:
Lickilicky’s strange tongue can stretch to many
times the length of its body. No one has figured
out how Lickilicky’s tongue can stretch so far.

koffing.name: koffing
koffing.description:
Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into
garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw,
rotting trash.

weezing.name: weezing
weezing.description:
It mixes gases between its two bodies.
It’s said that these Pokémon were seen
all over the Galar region back in the day.

rhyhorn.name: rhyhorn
rhyhorn.description:
Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can
shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

rhydon.name: rhydon
rhydon.description:
It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution.
It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

rhyperior.name: rhyperior
rhyperior.description:
It can load up to three projectiles per arm into
the holes in its hands. What launches out of those
holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

happiny.name: happiny
happiny.description:
Mimicking Chansey, Happiny will place an egg-
shaped stone in its belly pouch. Happiny will
treasure this stone.

chansey.name: chansey
chansey.description:
The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious
but also packed with nutrition. It’s used as a
high-class cooking ingredient.

blissey.name: blissey
blissey.description:
Whenever a Blissey finds a weakened Pokémon,
it will share its egg and offer its care until the
other Pokémon is all better.

tangela.name: tangela
tangela.description:
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows
nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this
Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

tangrowth.name: tangrowth
tangrowth.description:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

kangaskhan.name: kangaskhan
kangaskhan.description:
Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on
its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It
intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

horsea.name: horsea
horsea.description:
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle
currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits
out pitch-black ink and escapes.

seadra.name: seadra
seadra.description:
It’s the males that raise the offspring. While
Seadra are raising young, the spines on their
backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

kingdra.name: kingdra
kingdra.description:
With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon
will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra
and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.

goldeen.name: goldeen
goldeen.description:
Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly
in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

seaking.name: seaking
seaking.description:
In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in
preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on
beautiful colors.

staryu.name: staryu
staryu.description:
If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll
be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a
steady rhythm.

starmie.name: starmie
starmie.description:
This Pokémon has an organ known as its core.
The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is
unleashing its potent psychic powers.

mime-jr.name: mime-jr
mime-jr.description:
It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra
effort into copying the graceful dance steps
of Mr. Rime as practice.

mr-mime.name: mr-mime
mr-mime.description:
Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate
temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this
Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.

scyther.name: scyther
scyther.description:
As Scyther fights more and more battles, its
scythes become sharper and sharper. With a
single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree.

scizor.name: scizor
scizor.description:
Bulky pincers account for one third of Scizor’s
body weight. A single swing of one of these
pincers will crush a boulder completely.

smoochum.name: smoochum
smoochum.description:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

jynx.name: jynx
jynx.description:
Its cries sound like human speech.
However, it is impossible to tell
what it is trying to say.

elekid.name: elekid
elekid.description:
It generates electricity by whirling its arms.
However, it can’t store the energy it makes.

electabuzz.name: electabuzz
electabuzz.description:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

electivire.name: electivire
electivire.description:
It pushes the tips of its two tails
against the foe, then lets loose
with over 20,000 volts of power.

magby.name: magby
magby.description:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

magmar.name: magmar
magmar.description:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

magmortar.name: magmortar
magmortar.description:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

pinsir.name: pinsir
pinsir.description:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.

tauros.name: tauros
tauros.description:
When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails,
it’s a warning that the Pokémon is about to
charge with astounding speed.

magikarp.name: magikarp
magikarp.description:
It is virtually worthless in terms of both power
and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic
Pokémon in the world.

gyarados.name: gyarados
gyarados.description:
It has an extremely aggressive nature.
The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth
totally incinerates all targets.

ditto.name: ditto
ditto.description:
It can reconstitute its entire cellular
structure to change into what it sees,
but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

vaporeon.name: vaporeon
vaporeon.description:
When Vaporeon’s fins begin to vibrate, it is a
sign that rain will come within a few hours.

jolteon.name: jolteon
jolteon.description:
If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its
body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.

flareon.name: flareon
flareon.description:
Once it has stored up enough heat, this
Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to
1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

espeon.name: espeon
espeon.description:
By reading air currents, it can predict things such
as the weather or its foe’s next move.

umbreon.name: umbreon
umbreon.description:
When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores
secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at
its opponent’s eyes.

leafeon.name: leafeon
leafeon.description:
Galarians favor the distinctive aroma that drifts
from this Pokémon’s leaves. There’s a popular
perfume made using that scent.

glaceon.name: glaceon
glaceon.description:
Any who become captivated by the beauty of
the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen
before they know it.

sylveon.name: sylveon
sylveon.description:
By releasing enmity-erasing waves from its
ribbonlike feelers, Sylveon stops any conflict.

porygon.name: porygon
porygon.description:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.

porygon2.name: porygon2
porygon2.description:
This is a Porygon that was updated with special
data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about
many different subjects all on its own.

porygon-z.name: porygon-z
porygon-z.description:
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to
move between dimensions, but the program also
caused instability in Porygon-Z’s behavior.

omanyte.name: omanyte
omanyte.description:
Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

omastar.name: omastar
omastar.description:
Apparently, it
cracked SHELLDER's
shell with its sharp fangs and
sucked out the
insides.

kabuto.name: kabuto
kabuto.description:
A POKéMON that
was resurrected
from a fossil found in what was
once the ocean
floor eons ago.

kabutops.name: kabutops
kabutops.description:
Its sleek shape is
perfect for swim­
ming. It slashes prey with its
claws and drains
the body fluids.

aerodactyl.name: aerodactyl
aerodactyl.description:
A ferocious, pre­
historic POKéMON
that goes for the enemy's throat
with its serrated
saw-like fangs.

munchlax.name: munchlax
munchlax.description:
Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its
only concern. Whether the food is rotten or
fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.

articuno.name: articuno
articuno.description:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

zapdos.name: zapdos
zapdos.description:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.

moltres.name: moltres
moltres.description:
It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire.
Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare
of flames.

dratini.name: dratini
dratini.description:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

dragonair.name: dragonair
dragonair.description:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

dragonite.name: dragonite
dragonite.description:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

mewtwo.name: mewtwo
mewtwo.description:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

mew.name: mew
mew.description:
So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.

chikorita.name: chikorita
chikorita.description:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

bayleef.name: bayleef
bayleef.description:
The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma
that perks people up.

meganium.name: meganium
meganium.description:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

cyndaquil.name: cyndaquil
cyndaquil.description:
It is timid, and
always curls it­
self up in a ball. If attacked, it
flares up its back
for protection.

quilava.name: quilava
quilava.description:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

typhlosion.name: typhlosion
typhlosion.description:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

totodile.name: totodile
totodile.description:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

croconaw.name: croconaw
croconaw.description:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

feraligatr.name: feraligatr
feraligatr.description:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

sentret.name: sentret
sentret.description:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

furret.name: furret
furret.description:
The mother puts its offspring to
sleep by curling up around them.
It corners foes with speed.

hoothoot.name: hoothoot
hoothoot.description:
It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so
fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

noctowl.name: noctowl
noctowl.description:
Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to
see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

ledyba.name: ledyba
ledyba.description:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

ledian.name: ledian
ledian.description:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

spinarak.name: spinarak
spinarak.description:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

ariados.name: ariados
ariados.description:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

chinchou.name: chinchou
chinchou.description:
Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both
positive and negative charges flowing through them.

lanturn.name: lanturn
lanturn.description:
The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate
the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

togepi.name: togepi
togepi.description:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

togetic.name: togetic
togetic.description:
They say that it will appear before kindhearted,
caring people and shower them with happiness.

togekiss.name: togekiss
togekiss.description:
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly
been seen at all.

natu.name: natu
natu.description:
It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and
likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.

xatu.name: xatu
xatu.description:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.

mareep.name: mareep
mareep.description:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

flaaffy.name: flaaffy
flaaffy.description:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

ampharos.name: ampharos
ampharos.description:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

azurill.name: azurill
azurill.description:
The ball on Azurill’s tail bounces like a rubber
ball, and it’s full of the nutrients the Pokémon
needs to grow.

marill.name: marill
marill.description:
This Pokémon uses its round tail as a float. The
ball of Marill’s tail is filled with nutrients that
have been turned into an oil.

azumarill.name: azumarill
azumarill.description:
It spends most of its time in the water. On sunny
days, Azumarill floats on the surface of the water
and sunbathes.

bonsly.name: bonsly
bonsly.description:
It expels both sweat and tears from its eyes.
The sweat is a little salty, while the tears have
a slight bitterness.

sudowoodo.name: sudowoodo
sudowoodo.description:
If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it’s
a Sudowoodo, not a tree. It hides from the rain.

hoppip.name: hoppip
hoppip.description:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

skiploom.name: skiploom
skiploom.description:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

jumpluff.name: jumpluff
jumpluff.description:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

aipom.name: aipom
aipom.description:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

ambipom.name: ambipom
ambipom.description:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

sunkern.name: sunkern
sunkern.description:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

sunflora.name: sunflora
sunflora.description:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

yanma.name: yanma
yanma.description:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

yanmega.name: yanmega
yanmega.description:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

wooper.name: wooper
wooper.description:
This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the
water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

quagsire.name: quagsire
quagsire.description:
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it
bumps its head on boats and boulders
while swimming.

murkrow.name: murkrow
murkrow.description:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

honchkrow.name: honchkrow
honchkrow.description:
Becoming active at night, it is
known to swarm with numerous
MURKROW in tow.

misdreavus.name: misdreavus
misdreavus.description:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

mismagius.name: mismagius
mismagius.description:
Its cries sound like incantations.
Those hearing it are tormented
by headaches and hallucinations.

unown.name: unown
unown.description:
Its flat, thin body is always
stuck on walls. Its shape appears
to have some meaning.

wynaut.name: wynaut
wynaut.description:
It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash
against one another to toughen their spirits.

wobbuffet.name: wobbuffet
wobbuffet.description:
It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its
body to pump up its counterstrike.

girafarig.name: girafarig
girafarig.description:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

pineco.name: pineco
pineco.description:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

forretress.name: forretress
forretress.description:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

dunsparce.name: dunsparce
dunsparce.description:
This Pokémon’s tiny wings have some scientists
saying that Dunsparce used to fly through the sky
in ancient times.

gligar.name: gligar
gligar.description:
It flies straight at its target’s face,
then clamps down on the startled
victim to inject poison.

gliscor.name: gliscor
gliscor.description:
It observes prey while hanging
inverted from branches. When the
chance presents itself, it swoops!

snubbull.name: snubbull
snubbull.description:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

granbull.name: granbull
granbull.description:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

qwilfish.name: qwilfish
qwilfish.description:
When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows
as much water as it can to match the
opponent’s size.

shuckle.name: shuckle
shuckle.description:
It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks,
it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

heracross.name: heracross
heracross.description:
Heracross loves sweet sap and will go looking
through forests for it. The Pokémon uses its two
antennae to pick up scents as it searches.

sneasel.name: sneasel
sneasel.description:
Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it
suddenly extends the claws and startles
its enemy.

weavile.name: weavile
weavile.description:
They attack their quarry in packs. Prey as large
as Mamoswine easily fall to the teamwork of
a group of Weavile.

teddiursa.name: teddiursa
teddiursa.description:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

ursaring.name: ursaring
ursaring.description:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

slugma.name: slugma
slugma.description:
Its body is made of magma.
If it doesn’t keep moving, its
body will cool and harden.

magcargo.name: magcargo
magcargo.description:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

swinub.name: swinub
swinub.description:
It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up
food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

piloswine.name: piloswine
piloswine.description:
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back
stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

mamoswine.name: mamoswine
mamoswine.description:
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings
from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a
while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

corsola.name: corsola
corsola.description:
It will regrow any branches that break off its
head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola
branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.

remoraid.name: remoraid
remoraid.description:
The water they shoot from their mouths can hit
moving prey from more than 300 feet away.

octillery.name: octillery
octillery.description:
It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It
prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from
them before attacking.

delibird.name: delibird
delibird.description:
It carries food all day long. There are tales about
lost people who were saved by the food it had.

mantyke.name: mantyke
mantyke.description:
Mantyke living in Galar seem to be somewhat
sluggish. The colder waters of the seas in this
region may be the cause.

mantine.name: mantine
mantine.description:
If it builds up enough speed swimming, it
can jump out above the waves and glide
for over 300 feet.

skarmory.name: skarmory
skarmory.description:
The pointed feathers of these Pokémon are
sharper than swords. Skarmory and Corviknight
fight viciously over territory.

houndour.name: houndour
houndour.description:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

houndoom.name: houndoom
houndoom.description:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

phanpy.name: phanpy
phanpy.description:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

donphan.name: donphan
donphan.description:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

stantler.name: stantler
stantler.description:
Those who stare at its antlers will
gradually lose control of their
senses and be unable to stand.

smeargle.name: smeargle
smeargle.description:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

miltank.name: miltank
miltank.description:
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk, so it’s
been supporting the lives of people and other
Pokémon since ancient times.

raikou.name: raikou
raikou.description:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

entei.name: entei
entei.description:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

suicune.name: suicune
suicune.description:
Said to be the
reincarnation of
north winds, it can instantly
purify filthy,
murky water.

larvitar.name: larvitar
larvitar.description:
Born deep underground, it comes
aboveground and becomes a pupa once it
has finished eating the surrounding soil.

pupitar.name: pupitar
pupitar.description:
Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely.
Hard and fast, it has outstanding
destructive power.

tyranitar.name: tyranitar
tyranitar.description:
Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack,
so it is very eager to make challenges
against enemies.

lugia.name: lugia
lugia.description:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

ho-oh.name: ho-oh
ho-oh.description:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

celebi.name: celebi
celebi.description:
This Pokémon has the ability to move through
time. Records describing it as a forest deity can
be found from many different eras.

treecko.name: treecko
treecko.description:
TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom
of its feet that enable it to scale
vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes
with its thick tail.

grovyle.name: grovyle
grovyle.description:
The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s
body are convenient for camouflaging
it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing
trees in jungles.

sceptile.name: sceptile
sceptile.description:
The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body
are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is
very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe
from above or behind.

torchic.name: torchic
torchic.description:
TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER,
following behind with unsteady
steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over
1,800 degrees F, including fireballs
that leave the foe scorched black.

combusken.name: combusken
combusken.description:
COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and
thighs by running through fields and
mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed
and power, enabling it to dole out ten
kicks in one second.

blaziken.name: blaziken
blaziken.description:
In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense
flames from its wrists and attacks foes
courageously. The stronger the foe, the more
intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

mudkip.name: mudkip
mudkip.description:
The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly
sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense
movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking
place around it without using its eyes.

marshtomp.name: marshtomp
marshtomp.description:
The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is
enveloped by a thin, sticky film that
enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches
when the ocean tide is low.

swampert.name: swampert
swampert.description:
SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough
power to easily drag a boulder weighing
more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision
that lets it see even in murky water.

poochyena.name: poochyena
poochyena.description:
At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite
at anything that moves.
This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted.
However, it may turn tail if the prey
strikes back.

mightyena.name: mightyena
mightyena.description:
MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when
it is preparing to attack. It starts to
growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its
sharply pointed fangs.

zigzagoon.name: zigzagoon
zigzagoon.description:
It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on
trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and
calmer than the kind native to Galar.

linoone.name: linoone
linoone.description:
It uses its long tongue to taunt opponents.
Once the opposition is enraged, this Pokémon hurls
itself at the opponent, tackling them forcefully.

wurmple.name: wurmple
wurmple.description:
Using the spikes on its rear end,  
WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and
feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with
suction pads that allow it to cling to
glass without slipping.

silcoon.name: silcoon
silcoon.description:
SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch
using silk to keep from falling. There, 
this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution.
It peers out of the silk cocoon through
a small hole.

beautifly.name: beautifly
beautifly.description:
BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet
pollen of flowers. If you want to see
this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY
is sure to come looking for pollen.

cascoon.name: cascoon
cascoon.description:
CASCOON makes its protective cocoon
by wrapping its body entirely with a
fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens.
This POKéMON prepares for its evolution
inside the cocoon.

dustox.name: dustox
dustox.description:
DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.
Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted
by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the
leaves off roadside trees for food.

lotad.name: lotad
lotad.description:
It searches about for clean water. If it does not
drink water for too long, the leaf on its
head wilts.

lombre.name: lombre
lombre.description:
It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall.
It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow
in the riverbed.

ludicolo.name: ludicolo
ludicolo.description:
The rhythm of bright, festive music activates
Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.

seedot.name: seedot
seedot.description:
If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut.
It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon.

nuzleaf.name: nuzleaf
nuzleaf.description:
It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head,
it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.

shiftry.name: shiftry
shiftry.description:
A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian.
It can read the foe’s mind and take
preemptive action.

taillow.name: taillow
taillow.description:
TAILLOW courageously stands its
ground against foes, however strong
they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant
even after a loss. On the other hand,
it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

swellow.name: swellow
swellow.description:
SWELLOW flies high above our heads,
making graceful arcs in the sky.
This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless
prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s
clawed feet, preventing escape.

wingull.name: wingull
wingull.description:
It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea
breeze, it glides up into the expansive skies.

pelipper.name: pelipper
pelipper.description:
It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small
Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

ralts.name: ralts
ralts.description:
It is highly attuned to the emotions of people
and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

kirlia.name: kirlia
kirlia.description:
If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with
energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.

gardevoir.name: gardevoir
gardevoir.description:
It has the power to predict the future. Its power
peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

gallade.name: gallade
gallade.description:
True to its honorable-warrior image, it uses
the blades on its elbows only in defense of
something or someone.

surskit.name: surskit
surskit.description:
From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT
secretes an oil that enables it to walk
on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic
organisms in ponds and lakes.

masquerain.name: masquerain
masquerain.description:
MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with
the eyelike patterns on its antennas.
This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even
sideways and backwards - as if it were
a helicopter.

shroomish.name: shroomish
shroomish.description:
SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark
depths of forests. They are often
found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that
is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

breloom.name: breloom
breloom.description:
BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light
and sprightly footwork, then throws
punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts
boxers to shame.

slakoth.name: slakoth
slakoth.description:
SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty
hours every day. Because it moves so
little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists
of just three leaves.

vigoroth.name: vigoroth
vigoroth.description:
VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated
to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t
tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it
can’t be moving constantly.

slaking.name: slaking
slaking.description:
SLAKING spends all day lying down and
lolling about.
It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach,
this POKéMON reluctantly moves to
another spot.

nincada.name: nincada
nincada.description:
Because it lived almost entirely underground,
it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

ninjask.name: ninjask
ninjask.description:
Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too
long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.

shedinja.name: shedinja
shedinja.description:
A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears
in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

whismur.name: whismur
whismur.description:
The cry of a Whismur is over 100 decibels.
If you’re close to a Whismur when it lets out a
cry, you’ll be stuck with an all-day headache.

loudred.name: loudred
loudred.description:
Loudred’s ears serve as speakers, and they can
put out sound waves powerful enough to blow
away a house.

exploud.name: exploud
exploud.description:
In the past, people would use the loud voices of
these Pokémon as a means of communication
between distant cities.

makuhita.name: makuhita
makuhita.description:
MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep
getting up and attacking its foe
however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this
POKéMON stores more energy in its body
for evolving.

hariyama.name: hariyama
hariyama.description:
HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm
slaps in any number of locations.
One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches
could snap a telephone pole in two.

nosepass.name: nosepass
nosepass.description:
NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always
pointed to the north. If two of these
POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they
are close because their magnetic noses
repel one another.

probopass.name: probopass
probopass.description:
It freely controls three small
units called Mini-Noses using
magnetic force.

skitty.name: skitty
skitty.description:
SKITTY has the habit of becoming
fascinated by moving objects and
chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after
its own tail and become dizzy.

delcatty.name: delcatty
delcatty.description:
DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered
existence in which it can do as it
pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps
whenever it decides, its daily routines
are completely random.

sableye.name: sableye
sableye.description:
This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes
begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed
that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

mawile.name: mawile
mawile.description:
It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into
complacency, then bites with its huge,
relentless jaws.

aron.name: aron
aron.description:
This POKéMON has a body of steel.
To make its body, ARON feeds on
iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by
eating bridges and rails.

lairon.name: lairon
lairon.description:
LAIRON tempers its steel body by
drinking highly nutritious mineral
springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to
springs of delicious water.

aggron.name: aggron
aggron.description:
AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its
own territory. It mercilessly beats up
anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its
territory at all times.

meditite.name: meditite
meditite.description:
MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental
training deep in the mountains.
However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration
and focus. As a result, its training
never ends.

medicham.name: medicham
medicham.description:
It is said that through meditation,
MEDICHAM heightens energy inside
its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by
merging itself with fields and
mountains.

electrike.name: electrike
electrike.description:
It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging.
It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

manectric.name: manectric
manectric.description:
It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so
it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with
electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

plusle.name: plusle
plusle.description:
PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader
for its partners. Whenever a teammate
puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create
the crackling noises of sparks to show
its joy.

minun.name: minun
minun.description:
MINUN is more concerned about cheering
on its partners than its own safety.
It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of
sparks to cheer on its teammates.

volbeat.name: volbeat
volbeat.description:
With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits
light from its tail. It communicates with
others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light.
This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet
aroma of ILLUMISE.

illumise.name: illumise
illumise.description:
ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT
using a sweet fragrance. Once the
VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing
geometric designs on the canvas of
the night sky.

budew.name: budew
budew.description:
The pollen it releases contains poison. If this
Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s
toxicity is increased.

roselia.name: roselia
roselia.description:
Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance.
The stronger its aroma, the healthier
the Roselia is.

roserade.name: roserade
roserade.description:
After captivating opponents with its sweet scent,
it lashes them with its thorny whips.

gulpin.name: gulpin
gulpin.description:
Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its
stomach. As a result, it can swallow
something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a
special fluid that digests anything.

swalot.name: swalot
swalot.description:
It swallows anything whole.
It sweats toxic fluids from its
follicles to douse foes.

carvanha.name: carvanha
carvanha.description:
It won’t attack while it’s alone—not even if it
spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to
join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.

sharpedo.name: sharpedo
sharpedo.description:
As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo
will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling
toward the target to attack at 75 mph.

wailmer.name: wailmer
wailmer.description:
It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from
the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of
Wishiwashi every day.

wailord.name: wailord
wailord.description:
It can sometimes knock out opponents
with the shock created by breaching and
crashing its big body onto the water.

numel.name: numel
numel.description:
NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it
doesn’t notice being hit. However, it
can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething
cauldron of boiling magma.

camerupt.name: camerupt
camerupt.description:
CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body.
Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses
through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this
POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the
superheated magma.

torkoal.name: torkoal
torkoal.description:
It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows
out black soot if it is endangered.

spoink.name: spoink
spoink.description:
SPOINK bounces around on its tail.
The shock of its bouncing makes its
heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it
stops, its heart will stop.

grumpig.name: grumpig
grumpig.description:
GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its
body to amplify its psychic power waves
for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special
power, its snorting breath grows
labored.

spinda.name: spinda
spinda.description:
All the SPINDA that exist in the
world are said to have utterly unique
spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this
POKéMON give it the appearance of
dancing.

trapinch.name: trapinch
trapinch.description:
Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert.
Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.

vibrava.name: vibrava
vibrava.description:
The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its
two wings together cause severe headaches.

flygon.name: flygon
flygon.description:
This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms
it creates and seldom appears where people
can see it.

cacnea.name: cacnea
cacnea.description:
CACNEA lives in arid locations such
as deserts. It releases a strong aroma
from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON
shoots sharp thorns from its body to
bring the victim down.

cacturne.name: cacturne
cacturne.description:
During the daytime, CACTURNE remains
unmoving so that it does not lose any
moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night
when the temperature drops.

swablu.name: swablu
swablu.description:
SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that
are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON
is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and
sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

altaria.name: altaria
altaria.description:
ALTARIA dances and wheels through the
sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds.
By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners
experience dreamy wonderment.

zangoose.name: zangoose
zangoose.description:
Memories of battling its arch-rival
SEVIPER are etched into every cell of
ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks
with incredible agility.

seviper.name: seviper
seviper.description:
SEVIPER shares a generations-long
feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its
body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-
edged tail.

lunatone.name: lunatone
lunatone.description:
The phase of the moon apparently has some
effect on its power. It’s active on the night of
a full moon.

solrock.name: solrock
solrock.description:
When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to
the sun, thus blinding its foes.

barboach.name: barboach
barboach.description:
Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is
said to have been born from hardened mud.

whiscash.name: whiscash
whiscash.description:
It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will
eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

corphish.name: corphish
corphish.description:
No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will
adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

crawdaunt.name: crawdaunt
crawdaunt.description:
A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws.
It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

baltoy.name: baltoy
baltoy.description:
It moves while spinning around on its single foot.
Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on
their heads.

claydol.name: claydol
claydol.description:
This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient
clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

lileep.name: lileep
lileep.description:
LILEEP became extinct approximately
a hundred million years ago.
This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches
approaching prey using tentacles 
shaped like flower petals.

cradily.name: cradily
cradily.description:
CRADILY roams around the ocean floor
in search of food. This POKéMON freely
extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight
tentacles.

anorith.name: anorith
anorith.description:
ANORITH was regenerated from a
prehistoric fossil. This primitive
POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its
two large claws.

armaldo.name: armaldo
armaldo.description:
ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks
bounce off. This POKéMON’s two
enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to
punch right through a steel slab.

feebas.name: feebas
feebas.description:
Although unattractive and unpopular, this
Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a
subject of research.

milotic.name: milotic
milotic.description:
Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists.
It has even been referred to as the most
beautiful Pokémon of all.

castform.name: castform
castform.description:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

kecleon.name: kecleon
kecleon.description:
KECLEON is capable of changing its body
colors at will to blend in with its
surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON
can’t change the zigzag pattern on its
belly.

shuppet.name: shuppet
shuppet.description:
SHUPPET is attracted by feelings
of jealousy and vindictiveness.
If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear
in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves
of that person’s home.

banette.name: banette
banette.description:
BANETTE generates energy for laying
strong curses by sticking pins into its
own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful
plush doll that was thrown away.

duskull.name: duskull
duskull.description:
If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their
parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.

dusclops.name: dusclops
dusclops.description:
Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its
mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a
black hole.

dusknoir.name: dusknoir
dusknoir.description:
At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit
world, it steals people and Pokémon away.
No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

tropius.name: tropius
tropius.description:
The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s
neck are very popular with children.
This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for
fruit resulted in its own outgrowth
of fruit.

chingling.name: chingling
chingling.description:
It emits cries by agitating an orb
at the back of its throat.
It moves with flouncing hops.

chimecho.name: chimecho
chimecho.description:
Emitting ultrasonic cries, it
floats on winds to travel great
distances.

absol.name: absol
absol.description:
Every time ABSOL appears before people,
it is followed by a disaster such as an
earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the
disaster POKéMON.

snorunt.name: snorunt
snorunt.description:
It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll
cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice
to survive.

glalie.name: glalie
glalie.description:
It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with
fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in
the atmosphere.

froslass.name: froslass
froslass.description:
After a woman met her end on a snowy mountain,
her regrets lingered on. From them, this Pokémon
was born. Its favorite food is frozen souls.

spheal.name: spheal
spheal.description:
