SPHEAL is much faster rolling than 
walking to get around. When groups of
this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this,
their mealtimes are noisy.

sealeo.name: sealeo
sealeo.description:
SEALEO has the habit of always juggling
on the tip of its nose anything it sees
for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains
itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL
on its nose.

walrein.name: walrein
walrein.description:
WALREIN’s two massively developed
tusks can totally shatter blocks of
ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber
insulates it from subzero temperatures.

clamperl.name: clamperl
clamperl.description:
CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good
for protection - it is also used for
clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be
scored with nicks and scratches all
over.

huntail.name: huntail
huntail.description:
It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea.
It attracts prey by moving its tail
in mimicry of a small animal.

gorebyss.name: gorebyss
gorebyss.description:
GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas
at extreme depths. Its body is built to
withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of
this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed
by ordinary attacks.

relicanth.name: relicanth
relicanth.description:
It has remained unchanged for 100
million years. It was discovered
during a deep-sea exploration.

luvdisc.name: luvdisc
luvdisc.description:
LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the
tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON
earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the
ocean’s waves.

bagon.name: bagon
bagon.description:
BAGON has a dream of one day soaring
in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly,
this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has 
grown tough and as hard as tempered
steel.

shelgon.name: shelgon
shelgon.description:
Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells
are in the midst of transformation
to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy,
making its movements sluggish.

salamence.name: salamence
salamence.description:
SALAMENCE came about as a result of a
strong, long-held dream of growing
wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in
this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to
sprout its magnificent wings.

beldum.name: beldum
beldum.description:
Its cells are all magnetic,
and it communicates with others
by using magnetic pulses.

metang.name: metang
metang.description:
When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG
is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are
joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically,
this POKéMON generates strong
psychokinetic power.

metagross.name: metagross
metagross.description:
METAGROSS has four brains in total.
Combined, the four brains can breeze
through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer.
This POKéMON can float in the air by
tucking in its four legs.

regirock.name: regirock
regirock.description:
REGIROCK was sealed away by people
long ago. If this POKéMON’s body is
damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair
itself.

regice.name: regice
regice.description:
REGICE’s body was made during an ice
age. The deep-frozen body can’t be
melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of
minus 328 degrees F.

registeel.name: registeel
registeel.description:
REGISTEEL has a body that is harder
than any kind of metal.
Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON
eats.

latias.name: latias
latias.description:
LATIAS is highly sensitive to the
emotions of people. If it senses any
hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries
shrilly to intimidate the foe.

latios.name: latios
latios.description:
LATIOS has the ability to make its foe
see an image of what it has seen or
imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and
understands human speech.

kyogre.name: kyogre
kyogre.description:
KYOGRE has the power to create massive
rain clouds that cover the entire sky
and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were
suffering from droughts.

groudon.name: groudon
groudon.description:
GROUDON has long been described in 
mythology as the POKéMON that raised
lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a
cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

rayquaza.name: rayquaza
rayquaza.description:
RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions
of years in the earth’s ozone layer, 
never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water
and particles in the atmosphere.

jirachi.name: jirachi
jirachi.description:
Once every 1,000 years, the singing of a pure
voice will rouse this Pokémon from its near-
perpetual slumber. It wakes for only seven days.

deoxys.name: deoxys
deoxys.description:
The DNA of a space virus underwent a
sudden mutation upon exposure to a
laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s
chest appears to be its brain.

turtwig.name: turtwig
turtwig.description:
Made from soil, the shell on its
back hardens when it drinks water.
It lives along lakes.

grotle.name: grotle
grotle.description:
It lives along water in forests. In
the daytime, it leaves the forest
to sunbathe its treed shell.

torterra.name: torterra
torterra.description:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather
on its unmoving back to begin
building their nests.

chimchar.name: chimchar
chimchar.description:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

monferno.name: monferno
monferno.description:
To intimidate attackers, it
stretches the fire on its tail
to make itself appear bigger.

infernape.name: infernape
infernape.description:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.

piplup.name: piplup
piplup.description:
Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.

prinplup.name: prinplup
prinplup.description:
It lives alone, away from others.
Apparently, every one of them
believes it is the most important.

empoleon.name: empoleon
empoleon.description:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

starly.name: starly
starly.description:
They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

staravia.name: staravia
staravia.description:
It flies around forests and fields
in search of bug Pokémon.
It stays within a huge flock.

staraptor.name: staraptor
staraptor.description:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.

bidoof.name: bidoof
bidoof.description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can
perturb it. It is more agile and
active than it appears.

bibarel.name: bibarel
bibarel.description:
It makes its nest by damming
streams with bark and mud. It is
known as an industrious worker.

kricketot.name: kricketot
kricketot.description:
It shakes its head back to front,
causing its antennae to hit each
other and sound like a xylophone.

kricketune.name: kricketune
kricketune.description:
It crosses its knifelike arms in
front of its chest when it cries.
It can compose melodies ad lib.

shinx.name: shinx
shinx.description:
This Pokémon generates electricity by contracting
its muscles. Excited trembling is a sign that Shinx
is generating a tremendous amount of electricity.

luxio.name: luxio
luxio.description:
By joining its tail with that of another Luxio, this
Pokémon can receive some of the other Luxio’s
electricity and power up its own electric blasts.

luxray.name: luxray
luxray.description:
Luxray can see through solid objects. It will
instantly spot prey trying to hide behind walls,
even if the walls are thick.

cranidos.name: cranidos
cranidos.description:
It lived in jungles around 100
million years ago. Its skull is as
hard as iron.

rampardos.name: rampardos
rampardos.description:
Its powerful head butt has enough
power to shatter even the most
durable things upon impact.

shieldon.name: shieldon
shieldon.description:
A Pokémon that lived in jungles
around 100 million years ago. Its
facial hide is extremely hard.

bastiodon.name: bastiodon
bastiodon.description:
Any frontal attack is repulsed.
It is a docile Pokémon that
feeds on grass and berries.

burmy.name: burmy
burmy.description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.

wormadam.name: wormadam
wormadam.description:
When BURMY evolved, its cloak
became a part of this Pokémon’s
body. The cloak is never shed.

mothim.name: mothim
mothim.description:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.

combee.name: combee
combee.description:
The members of the trio spend all their time
together. Each one has a slightly different taste
in nectar.

vespiquen.name: vespiquen
vespiquen.description:
It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its
enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives
to defend Vespiquen.

pachirisu.name: pachirisu
pachirisu.description:
It makes fur balls that crackle
with static electricity. It stores
them with berries in tree holes.

buizel.name: buizel
buizel.description:
It has a flotation sac that is
like an inflatable collar. It floats
on water with its head out.

floatzel.name: floatzel
floatzel.description:
It floats using its well-developed
flotation sac. It assists in the
rescues of drowning people.

cherubi.name: cherubi
cherubi.description:
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked
by bird Pokémon that would love to make off
with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.

cherrim.name: cherrim
cherrim.description:
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes
this form. It’s full of energy while it’s like this,
and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

shellos.name: shellos
shellos.description:
There’s speculation that its appearance is
determined by what it eats, but the truth
remains elusive.

gastrodon.name: gastrodon
gastrodon.description:
It secretes a purple fluid to deter enemies.
This fluid isn’t poisonous—instead, it’s super
sticky, and once it sticks, it’s very hard to unstick.

drifloon.name: drifloon
drifloon.description:
Perhaps seeking company, it approaches children.
However, it often quickly runs away again when
the children play too roughly with it.

drifblim.name: drifblim
drifblim.description:
Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls
burdened with regrets, silently drifting through
the dusk.

buneary.name: buneary
buneary.description:
If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something
is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the
Pokémon is in need of care.

lopunny.name: lopunny
lopunny.description:
Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings.
If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds
with superdestructive kicks.

glameow.name: glameow
glameow.description:
It claws if displeased and purrs
when affectionate. Its fickleness
is very popular among some.

purugly.name: purugly
purugly.description:
It is a brazen brute that barges
its way into another Pokémon’s
nest and claims it as its own.

stunky.name: stunky
stunky.description:
From its rear, it sprays a foul-smelling liquid at
opponents. It aims for their faces, and it can hit
them from over 16 feet away.

skuntank.name: skuntank
skuntank.description:
In its belly, it reserves stinky fluid that it shoots
from its tail during battle. As this Pokémon’s diet
varies, so does the stench of its fluid.

bronzor.name: bronzor
bronzor.description:
It appears in ancient ruins. The pattern on its
body doesn’t come from any culture in the
Galar region, so it remains shrouded in mystery.

bronzong.name: bronzong
bronzong.description:
Some believe it to be a deity that summons rain
clouds. When angered, it lets out a warning cry
that rings out like the tolling of a bell.

chatot.name: chatot
chatot.description:
It can learn and speak human
words. If they gather, they all
learn the same saying.

spiritomb.name: spiritomb
spiritomb.description:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108
spirits. It is bound to a fissure
in an odd keystone.

gible.name: gible
gible.description:
It nests in small, horizontal holes
in cave walls. It pounces to catch
prey that stray too close.

gabite.name: gabite
gabite.description:
There is a long-held belief that
medicine made from its scales will
heal even incurable illnesses.

garchomp.name: garchomp
garchomp.description:
When it folds up its body and
extends its wings, it looks like a
jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

riolu.name: riolu
riolu.description:
It’s exceedingly energetic, with enough stamina
to keep running all through the night. Taking it
for walks can be a challenging experience.

lucario.name: lucario
lucario.description:
It controls waves known as auras, which are
powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks.
It uses these waves to take down its prey.

hippopotas.name: hippopotas
hippopotas.description:
It moves through the sands with its mouth open,
swallowing sand along with its prey. It gets rid of
the sand by spouting it from its nose.

hippowdon.name: hippowdon
hippowdon.description:
Stones can get stuck in the ports on their bodies.
Dwebble help dislodge such stones, so
Hippowdon look after these Pokémon.

skorupi.name: skorupi
skorupi.description:
After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently
for prey to come near. This Pokémon and
Sizzlipede share common descent.

drapion.name: drapion
drapion.description:
Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This
Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead,
going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

croagunk.name: croagunk
croagunk.description:
It makes frightening noises with its poison-filled
cheek sacs. When opponents flinch, Croagunk
hits them with a poison jab.

toxicroak.name: toxicroak
toxicroak.description:
It bounces toward opponents and gouges them
with poisonous claws. No more than a scratch
is needed to knock out its adversaries.

carnivine.name: carnivine
carnivine.description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-
smelling saliva, then chomps down.
It takes a whole day to eat prey.

finneon.name: finneon
finneon.description:
After long exposure to sunlight,
the patterns on its tail fins shine
vividly when darkness arrives.

lumineon.name: lumineon
lumineon.description:
It lives on the deep-sea floor.
It attracts prey by flashing the
patterns on its four tail fins.

snover.name: snover
snover.description:
It lives on snowy mountains. It sinks its legs into
the snow to absorb water and keep its own
temperature down.

abomasnow.name: abomasnow
abomasnow.description:
If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after
Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable
arms like hammers.

rotom.name: rotom
rotom.description:
In this form, Rotom applies its new power over
wind to its love of pranks. It will happily blow
away any important documents it can find.

uxie.name: uxie
uxie.description:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.”
It is said that it can wipe out the
memory of those who see its eyes.

mesprit.name: mesprit
mesprit.description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

azelf.name: azelf
azelf.description:
It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came
from the same egg.

dialga.name: dialga
dialga.description:
It has the power to control time.
It appears in Sinnoh-region myths
as an ancient deity.

palkia.name: palkia
palkia.description:
It has the ability to distort
space. It is described as a deity
in Sinnoh-region mythology.

heatran.name: heatran
heatran.description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

regigigas.name: regigigas
regigigas.description:
There is an enduring legend that
states this Pokémon towed
continents with ropes.

giratina.name: giratina
giratina.description:
A Pokémon that is said to live in a
world on the reverse side of ours.
It appears in an ancient cemetery.

cresselia.name: cresselia
cresselia.description:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

phione.name: phione
phione.description:
A Pokémon that lives in warm seas.
It inflates the flotation sac on its
head to drift and search for food.

manaphy.name: manaphy
manaphy.description:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

darkrai.name: darkrai
darkrai.description:
It can lull people to sleep and
make them dream. It is active
during nights of the new moon.

shaymin.name: shaymin
shaymin.description:
It lives in flower patches and
avoids detection by curling up
to look like a flowering plant.

arceus.name: arceus
arceus.description:
It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born
before the universe even existed.

victini.name: victini
victini.description:
This Pokémon brings victory. It is said
that Trainers with Victini always win,
regardless of the type of encounter.

snivy.name: snivy
snivy.description:
It is very intelligent and calm.
Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes
its movements swifter.

servine.name: servine
servine.description:
It moves along the ground as if sliding.
Its swift movements befuddle its foes,
and it then attacks with a vine whip.

serperior.name: serperior
serperior.description:
It can stop its opponents’
movements with just a glare. It takes
in solar energy and boosts it internally.

tepig.name: tepig
tepig.description:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks
while shooting fireballs from its nose.
It roasts berries before it eats them.

pignite.name: pignite
pignite.description:
When its internal fire flares up, its
movements grow sharper and faster.
When in trouble, it emits smoke.

emboar.name: emboar
emboar.description:
It can throw a fire punch by setting its
fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares
deeply about its friends.

oshawott.name: oshawott
oshawott.description:
It fights using the scalchop on its
stomach. In response to an attack,
it retaliates immediately by slashing.

dewott.name: dewott
dewott.description:
Strict training is how it learns its
flowing double-scalchop technique.

samurott.name: samurott
samurott.description:
One swing of the sword incorporated in
its armor can fell an opponent. A simple
glare from one of them quiets everybody.

patrat.name: patrat
patrat.description:
Using food stored in cheek pouches,
they can keep watch for days. They use
their tails to communicate with others.

watchog.name: watchog
watchog.description:
When they see an enemy, their tails
stand high, and they spit the seeds of
berries stored in their cheek pouches.

lillipup.name: lillipup
lillipup.description:
This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious.
It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect
information about its surroundings.

herdier.name: herdier
herdier.description:
Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon.
So much so that there’s a theory that Herdier was
the first Pokémon to partner with people.

stoutland.name: stoutland
stoutland.description:
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans.
Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up
to people in about three days.

purrloin.name: purrloin
purrloin.description:
It steals things from people just to amuse itself
with their frustration. A rivalry exists between
this Pokémon and Nickit.

liepard.name: liepard
liepard.description:
Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant
figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

pansage.name: pansage
pansage.description:
This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest.
Eating a leaf from its head whisks
weariness away as if by magic.

simisage.name: simisage
simisage.description:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its
barbed tail around wildly. The leaf
growing on its head is very bitter.

pansear.name: pansear
pansear.description:
When it is angered, the temperature
of its head tuft reaches 600° F.
It uses its tuft to roast berries.

simisear.name: simisear
simisear.description:
It loves sweets because they become
energy for the fire burning inside
its body.

panpour.name: panpour
panpour.description:
The water stored inside the tuft on
its head is full of nutrients. Plants
that receive its water grow large.

simipour.name: simipour
simipour.description:
The tuft on its head holds water. When
the level runs low, it replenishes the
tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.

munna.name: munna
munna.description:
Late at night, it appears beside people’s pillows.
As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body
give off a faint glow.

musharna.name: musharna
musharna.description:
When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t
get too near. If you do, your nightmares will
become reality.

pidove.name: pidove
pidove.description:
Where people go, these Pokémon follow.
If you’re scattering food for them, be careful—
several hundred of them can gather at once.

tranquill.name: tranquill
tranquill.description:
It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far
it travels, it can always find its way back to its
master and its nest.

unfezant.name: unfezant
unfezant.description:
Females of this species are very capable fliers,
particularly notable for their stamina. They also
take longer to adjust to people.

blitzle.name: blitzle
blitzle.description:
Its mane shines when it discharges
electricity. They use their flashing
manes to communicate with one another.

zebstrika.name: zebstrika
zebstrika.description:
They have lightning-like movements.
When Zebstrika run at full speed,
the sound of thunder reverberates.

roggenrola.name: roggenrola
roggenrola.description:
It’s as hard as steel, but apparently a long soak in
water will cause it to soften a bit.

boldore.name: boldore
boldore.description:
If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be
wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.

gigalith.name: gigalith
gigalith.description:
This hardy Pokémon can often be found on
construction sites and in mines, working
alongside people and Copperajah.

woobat.name: woobat
woobat.description:
While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots
of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s
evidence that Woobat live there.

swoobat.name: swoobat
swoobat.description:
Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out.
Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a
little while.

drilbur.name: drilbur
drilbur.description:
It brings its claws together and whirls around at
high speed before rushing toward its prey.

excadrill.name: excadrill
excadrill.description:
It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to
have formed naturally to actually be a result
of Excadrill’s rampant digging.

audino.name: audino
audino.description:
It touches others with the feelers on
its ears, using the sound of their
heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

timburr.name: timburr
timburr.description:
It loves helping out with construction projects.
It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt,
it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.

gurdurr.name: gurdurr
gurdurr.description:
It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other
Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other
Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.

conkeldurr.name: conkeldurr
conkeldurr.description:
Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more
durable than normal concrete, even when the
compositions of the two materials are the same.

tympole.name: tympole
tympole.description:
Graceful ripples running across the water’s
surface are a sure sign that Tympole are singing
in high-pitched voices below.

palpitoad.name: palpitoad
palpitoad.description:
It weakens its prey with sound waves intense
enough to cause headaches, then entangles
them with its sticky tongue.

seismitoad.name: seismitoad
seismitoad.description:
The vibrating of the bumps all over its body
causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and
Croagunk are similar species.

throh.name: throh
throh.description:
It performs throwing moves with first-rate skill.
Over the course of many battles, Throh’s belt
grows darker as it absorbs its wearer’s sweat.

sawk.name: sawk
sawk.description:
If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its
single-minded pursuit of strength, it’s best to
quietly pass by.

sewaddle.name: sewaddle
sewaddle.description:
Leavanny dress it in clothes they made
for it when it hatched. It hides its head
in its hood while it is sleeping.

swadloon.name: swadloon
swadloon.description:
Forests where Swadloon live have superb
foliage because the nutrients they make
from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

leavanny.name: leavanny
leavanny.description:
Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves
clothing for it from leaves, using the
cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

venipede.name: venipede
venipede.description:
Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species,
but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.

whirlipede.name: whirlipede
whirlipede.description:
This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into
its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.

scolipede.name: scolipede
scolipede.description:
Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on
its neck before slamming them into the ground
and jabbing them with its claws’ toxic spikes.

cottonee.name: cottonee
cottonee.description:
It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself.
If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds,
it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.

whimsicott.name: whimsicott
whimsicott.description:
It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If
it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and
have no choice but to answer for its mischief.

petilil.name: petilil
petilil.description:
Petilil appears around sources of clean water.
Boiling leaves from this Pokémon’s head results in
a liquid that’s sometimes used as a bug repellent.

lilligant.name: lilligant
lilligant.description:
It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a
hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head
to bloom.

basculin.name: basculin
basculin.description:
Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on
the hook. And there are always more to catch—
many people release them into lakes illicitly.

sandile.name: sandile
sandile.description:
The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun
sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand
and sleeps until sunrise.

krokorok.name: krokorok
krokorok.description:
Krokorok has specialized eyes that enable it to
see in the dark. This ability lets Krokorok hunt in
the dead of night without getting lost.

krookodile.name: krookodile
krookodile.description:
This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands.
Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy
plates of iron with almost no effort at all.

darumaka.name: darumaka
darumaka.description:
It derives its power from fire burning inside
its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will
immediately fall asleep.

darmanitan.name: darmanitan
darmanitan.description:
Anger has reignited its atrophied flame sac.
This Pokémon spews fire everywhere as it
rampages indiscriminately.

maractus.name: maractus
maractus.description:
With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles
of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling
bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.

dwebble.name: dwebble
dwebble.description:
When it finds a stone appealing, it creates a hole
inside it and uses it as its home. This Pokémon is
the natural enemy of Roggenrola and Rolycoly.

crustle.name: crustle
crustle.description:
This highly territorial Pokémon prefers dry
climates. It won’t come out of its boulder on
rainy days.

scraggy.name: scraggy
scraggy.description:
If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and
no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this
troublesome Pokémon.

scrafty.name: scrafty
scrafty.description:
As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem,
they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s
concrete pillars.

sigilyph.name: sigilyph
sigilyph.description:
Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some
say they were the guardians of an ancient city.
Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.

yamask.name: yamask
yamask.description:
A clay slab with cursed engravings took
possession of a Yamask. The slab is said
to be absorbing the Yamask’s dark power.

cofagrigus.name: cofagrigus
cofagrigus.description:
This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold.
People say it no longer remembers that it was
once human.

tirtouga.name: tirtouga
tirtouga.description:
Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon
can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

carracosta.name: carracosta
carracosta.description:
They can live both in the ocean and on
land. A slap from one of them is enough
to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

archen.name: archen
archen.description:
Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon,
they were unable to fly and moved about
by hopping from one branch to another.

archeops.name: archeops
archeops.description:
They are intelligent and will cooperate
to catch prey. From the ground, they
use a running start to take flight.

trubbish.name: trubbish
trubbish.description:
Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you
leave trash lying around, you could even find
one of these Pokémon living in your room.

zorua.name: zorua
zorua.description:
Zorua is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems
to be what led to the development of Zorua’s
ability to take on the forms of other creatures.

zoroark.name: zoroark
zoroark.description:
This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its
kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to
keep its den and pack safe.

minccino.name: minccino
minccino.description:
The way it brushes away grime with its tail
can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on
spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

cinccino.name: cinccino
cinccino.description:
Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads
over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust.
Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

gothita.name: gothita
gothita.description:
Though they’re still only babies, there’s psychic
power stored in their ribbonlike feelers, and
sometimes they use that power to fight.

gothorita.name: gothorita
gothorita.description:
It’s said that when stars shine in the night sky,
this Pokémon will spirit away sleeping children.
Some call it the Witch of Punishment.

gothitelle.name: gothitelle
gothitelle.description:
It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes
conflict. It’s also able to predict the future based
on the movement of the stars.

solosis.name: solosis
solosis.description:
It communicates with others telepathically.
Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes
a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.

duosion.name: duosion
duosion.description:
Its psychic power can supposedly cover a range
of more than half a mile—but only if its two
brains can agree with each other.

reuniclus.name: reuniclus
reuniclus.description:
While it could use its psychic abilities in battle,
this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms
around to beat opponents into submission.

ducklett.name: ducklett
ducklett.description:
These bird Pokémon are excellent divers.
They swim around in the water eating
their favorite food--peat moss.

swanna.name: swanna
swanna.description:
Swanna start to dance at dusk.
The one dancing in the middle is
the leader of the flock.

vanillite.name: vanillite
vanillite.description:
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself
comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to
cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.

vanillish.name: vanillish
vanillish.description:
By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body.
This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with
warm, sunny weather.

vanilluxe.name: vanilluxe
vanilluxe.description:
When its anger reaches a breaking point, this
Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes
every creature around it, be they friend or foe.

deerling.name: deerling
deerling.description:
The color and scent of their fur changes
to match the mountain grass. When they
sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

sawsbuck.name: sawsbuck
sawsbuck.description:
They migrate according to the seasons.
People can tell the season by looking at
Sawsbuck’s horns.

emolga.name: emolga
emolga.description:
As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles
with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can
cause a lot of trouble.

karrablast.name: karrablast
karrablast.description:
Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy
in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet
will cause this Pokémon to evolve.

escavalier.name: escavalier
escavalier.description:
They use shells they’ve stolen from Shelmet
to arm and protect themselves. They’re very
popular Pokémon in the Galar region.

foongus.name: foongus
foongus.description:
No one knows what the Poké Ball–like pattern on
Foongus means or why Foongus has it.

amoonguss.name: amoonguss
amoonguss.description:
This Pokémon puffs poisonous spores at its foes.
If the spores aren’t washed off quickly, they’ll
grow into mushrooms wherever they land.

frillish.name: frillish
frillish.description:
It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws
it down to the deeps, five miles below the
ocean’s surface.

jellicent.name: jellicent
jellicent.description:
Most of this Pokémon’s body composition is
identical to sea water. It makes sunken ships
its lair.

alomomola.name: alomomola
alomomola.description:
They float upon the open sea. Many water
Pokémon gather in the area around Alomomola.

joltik.name: joltik
joltik.description:
Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon.
It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t
produce a charge on its own.

galvantula.name: galvantula
galvantula.description:
It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its
means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could
be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

ferroseed.name: ferroseed
ferroseed.description:
It defends itself by launching spikes, but its
aim isn’t very good at first. Only after a lot of
practice will it improve.

ferrothorn.name: ferrothorn
ferrothorn.description:
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks,
and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb
the nutrients it finds within the stone.

klink.name: klink
klink.description:
The two minigears that compose this Pokémon
are closer than twins. They mesh well only with
each other.

klang.name: klang
klang.description:
When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up
perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and
this Pokémon’s rotation speed increases sharply.

klinklang.name: klinklang
klinklang.description:
From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of
electricity. Its red core contains an enormous
amount of energy.

tynamo.name: tynamo
tynamo.description:
While one alone doesn’t have much power,
a chain of many Tynamo can be as
powerful as lightning.

eelektrik.name: eelektrik
eelektrik.description:
They coil around foes and shock them
with electricity-generating organs that
seem simply to be circular patterns.

eelektross.name: eelektross
eelektross.description:
They crawl out of the ocean using their
arms. They will attack prey on shore and
immediately drag it into the ocean.

elgyem.name: elgyem
elgyem.description:
If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery
will appear on the screen. That scenery is said
to be from its home.

beheeyem.name: beheeyem
beheeyem.description:
Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm,
a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.

litwick.name: litwick
litwick.description:
The flame on its head keeps its body slightly
warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the
hand to guide them to the spirit world.

lampent.name: lampent
lampent.description:
This Pokémon appears just before someone
passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary
of death.

chandelure.name: chandelure
chandelure.description:
This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions.
It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with
the ominous dancing of its flames.

axew.name: axew
axew.description:
These Pokémon nest in the ground and use their
tusks to crush hard berries. Crushing berries is
also how they test each other’s strength.

fraxure.name: fraxure
fraxure.description:
After battle, this Pokémon carefully sharpens its
tusks on river rocks. It needs to take care of its
tusks—if one breaks, it will never grow back.

haxorus.name: haxorus
haxorus.description:
Its resilient tusks are its pride and joy. It licks up
dirt to take in the minerals it needs to keep its
tusks in top condition.

cubchoo.name: cubchoo
cubchoo.description:
When this Pokémon is in good health, its snot
becomes thicker and stickier. It will smear its snot
on anyone it doesn’t like.

beartic.name: beartic
beartic.description:
It swims through frigid seas, searching for prey.
From its frozen breath, it forms icy fangs that
are harder than steel.

cryogonal.name: cryogonal
cryogonal.description:
When its body temperature goes up, it
turns into steam and vanishes. When its
temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

shelmet.name: shelmet
shelmet.description:
When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell.
This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast,
however, because they can still get into the shell.

accelgor.name: accelgor
accelgor.description:
It moves with blinding speed and lobs poison at
foes. Featuring Accelgor as a main character is
a surefire way to make a movie or comic popular.

stunfisk.name: stunfisk
stunfisk.description:
Living in mud with a high iron content has given it
a strong steel body.

mienfoo.name: mienfoo
mienfoo.description:
In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop
with its arms more than 100 times.

mienshao.name: mienshao
mienshao.description:
When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging
opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the
fur on its arms.

druddigon.name: druddigon
druddigon.description:
Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips
sunbathing—it won’t be able to move if its body
gets too cold.

golett.name: golett
golett.description:
They were sculpted from clay in ancient times.
No one knows why, but some of them are driven
to continually line up boulders.

golurk.name: golurk
golurk.description:
Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient
castles served as perches from which Golurk
could fire energy beams.

pawniard.name: pawniard
pawniard.description:
It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges
of the blades covering its body. These sharpened
blades allow it to bring down opponents.

bisharp.name: bisharp
bisharp.description:
It’s accompanied by a large retinue of Pawniard.
Bisharp keeps a keen eye on its minions, ensuring
none of them even think of double-crossing it.

bouffalant.name: bouffalant
bouffalant.description:
These Pokémon can crush a car with no more
than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on
their heads hold higher positions within the herd.

rufflet.name: rufflet
rufflet.description:
If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can’t resist
challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses,
it starts bawling.

braviary.name: braviary
braviary.description:
Known for its bravery and pride, this majestic
Pokémon is often seen as a motif for various
kinds of emblems.

vullaby.name: vullaby
vullaby.description:
It wears a bone to protect its rear.
It often squabbles with others of its kind over
particularly comfy bones.

mandibuzz.name: mandibuzz
mandibuzz.description:
Although it’s a bit of a ruffian, this Pokémon will
take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them
till they’re ready to leave the nest.

heatmor.name: heatmor
heatmor.description:
There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in
the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the
hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.

durant.name: durant
durant.description:
They lay their eggs deep inside their nests.
When attacked by Heatmor, they retaliate
using their massive mandibles.

deino.name: deino
deino.description:
When it encounters something, its first urge is
usually to bite it. If it likes what it tastes, it will
commit the associated scent to memory.

zweilous.name: zweilous
zweilous.description:
While hunting for prey, Zweilous wanders its
territory, its two heads often bickering over
which way to go.

hydreigon.name: hydreigon
hydreigon.description:
There are a slew of stories about villages that
were destroyed by Hydreigon. It bites anything
that moves.

larvesta.name: larvesta
larvesta.description:
The people of ancient times believed that
Larvesta fell from the sun.

volcarona.name: volcarona
volcarona.description:
Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it
does this to start fires. Others say it’s trying to
rescue those that suffer in the cold.

cobalion.name: cobalion
cobalion.description:
This legendary Pokémon battled against
humans to protect Pokémon.
Its personality is calm and composed.

terrakion.name: terrakion
terrakion.description:
This Pokémon came to the defense of
Pokémon that had lost their homes in
a war among humans.

virizion.name: virizion
virizion.description:
This Pokémon fought humans in order
to protect its friends. Legends about it
continue to be passed down.

tornadus.name: tornadus
tornadus.description:
The lower half of its body is wrapped in
a cloud of energy. It zooms through
the sky at 200 mph.

thundurus.name: thundurus
thundurus.description:
Countless charred remains mar the
landscape of places through which
Thundurus has passed.

reshiram.name: reshiram
reshiram.description:
Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the
sky like a jet airplane. It’s said that this Pokémon
will scorch the world.

zekrom.name: zekrom
zekrom.description:
When the interior part of its tail spins like a
motor, Zekrom can generate many bolts of
lightning to blast its surroundings.

landorus.name: landorus
landorus.description:
Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful
crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of
the Fields.”

kyurem.name: kyurem
kyurem.description:
Dwelling within it is a power even greater than
that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme
cold keeps that power bound.

keldeo.name: keldeo
keldeo.description:
By blasting water from its hooves, it can
glide across water. It excels at using
leg moves while battling.

meloetta.name: meloetta
meloetta.description:
Its melodies are sung with a special
vocalization method that can control
the feelings of those who hear it.

genesect.name: genesect
genesect.description:
Over 300 million years ago, it was feared
as the strongest of hunters.
It has been modified by Team Plasma.

chespin.name: chespin
chespin.description:
The quills on its head are usually soft.
When it flexes them, the points become
so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

quilladin.name: quilladin
quilladin.description:
It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’
attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

chesnaught.name: chesnaught
chesnaught.description:
Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank.
It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

fennekin.name: fennekin
fennekin.description:
Eating a twig fills it with energy,
and its roomy ears give vent to air
hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

braixen.name: braixen
braixen.description:
It has a twig stuck in its tail. With
friction from its tail fur, it sets the
twig on fire and launches into battle.

delphox.name: delphox
delphox.description:
It gazes into the flame at the tip of
its branch to achieve a focused state,
which allows it to see into the future.

froakie.name: froakie
froakie.description:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

frogadier.name: frogadier
frogadier.description:
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise
control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

greninja.name: greninja
greninja.description:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

bunnelby.name: bunnelby
bunnelby.description:
It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can
dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.

diggersby.name: diggersby
diggersby.description:
With power equal to an excavator, it can dig
through dense bedrock. It’s a huge help during
tunnel construction.

fletchling.name: fletchling
fletchling.description:
Its melodious cries are actually warnings.
Fletchling will mercilessly peck at anything
that enters its territory.

fletchinder.name: fletchinder
fletchinder.description:
Fletchinder launches embers into the den of
its prey. When the prey comes leaping out,
Fletchinder’s sharp talons finish it off.

talonflame.name: talonflame
talonflame.description:
Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird
Pokémon. To intimidate opponents, it sends
embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.

scatterbug.name: scatterbug
scatterbug.description:
When under attack from bird Pokémon,
it spews a poisonous black powder
that causes paralysis on contact.

spewpa.name: spewpa
spewpa.description:
It lives hidden within thicket shadows.
When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur
covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

vivillon.name: vivillon
vivillon.description:
Vivillon with many different patterns are
found all over the world. These patterns
are affected by the climate of their habitat.

litleo.name: litleo
litleo.description:
The stronger the opponent it faces,
the more heat surges from its mane
and the more power flows through its body.

pyroar.name: pyroar
pyroar.description:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

flabebe.name: flabebe
flabebe.description:
It draws out and controls the hidden power
of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds
is most likely part of its body.

floette.name: floette
floette.description:
It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for
flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws
out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

florges.name: florges
florges.description:
It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory,
and it obtains power from basking in the energy
emitted by flowering plants.

skiddo.name: skiddo
skiddo.description:
Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in
harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

gogoat.name: gogoat
gogoat.description:
It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by
subtle shifts in the grip on its horns.
This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

pancham.name: pancham
pancham.description:
It chooses a Pangoro as its master and then
imitates its master’s actions. This is how it learns
to battle and hunt for prey.

pangoro.name: pangoro
pangoro.description:
This Pokémon is quick to anger, and it has no
problem using its prodigious strength to get its
way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon.

furfrou.name: furfrou
furfrou.description:
Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes
it more elegant but also increases the
swiftness of its movements.

espurr.name: espurr
espurr.description:
Though Espurr’s expression never changes,
behind that blank stare is an intense struggle to
contain its devastating psychic power.

meowstic.name: meowstic
meowstic.description:
Females are a bit more selfish and aggressive
than males. If they don’t get what they want,
they will torment you with their psychic abilities.

honedge.name: honedge
honedge.description:
Honedge’s soul once belonged to a person who
was killed a long time ago by the sword that
makes up Honedge’s body.

doublade.name: doublade
doublade.description:
Honedge evolves into twins. The two blades
rub together to emit a metallic sound that
unnerves opponents.

aegislash.name: aegislash
aegislash.description:
In this defensive stance, Aegislash uses its steel
body and a force field of spectral power to
reduce the damage of any attack.

spritzee.name: spritzee
spritzee.description:
A scent pouch within this Pokémon’s body allows
it to create various scents. A change in its diet
will alter the fragrance it produces.

aromatisse.name: aromatisse
aromatisse.description:
The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so
powerful that this Pokémon’s companions will
eventually lose their sense of smell.

swirlix.name: swirlix
swirlix.description:
It eats its own weight in sugar every day.
If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes
incredibly grumpy.

slurpuff.name: slurpuff
slurpuff.description:
By taking in a person’s scent, it can sniff out their
mental and physical condition. It’s hoped that
this skill will have many medical applications.

inkay.name: inkay
inkay.description:
It spins while making its luminescent spots flash.
These spots allow it to communicate with others
by using different patterns of light.

malamar.name: malamar
malamar.description:
Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly
induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer
under Malamar’s control.

binacle.name: binacle
binacle.description:
After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they
adhere themselves to it and live together.
They cooperate to gather food during high tide.

barbaracle.name: barbaracle
barbaracle.description:
Seven Binacle come together to form one
Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head
gives orders to those serving as the limbs.

skrelp.name: skrelp
skrelp.description:
It drifts in the ocean, blending in with floating
seaweed. When other Pokémon come to feast on
the seaweed, Skrelp feasts on them instead.

dragalge.name: dragalge
dragalge.description:
Dragalge uses a poisonous liquid capable of
corroding metal to send tankers that enter its
territory to the bottom of the sea.

clauncher.name: clauncher
clauncher.description:
Clauncher’s claws can fall off during battle, but
they’ll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is
popular as a delicacy in Galar.

clawitzer.name: clawitzer
clawitzer.description:
After using the feelers on its oversized claw to
detect the location of prey, Clawitzer launches
a cannonball of water at its target.

helioptile.name: helioptile
helioptile.description:
When spread, the frills on its head act like solar
panels, generating the power behind this
Pokémon’s electric moves.

heliolisk.name: heliolisk
heliolisk.description:
A now-vanished desert culture treasured these
Pokémon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to
the Galar region, treasure came with them.

tyrunt.name: tyrunt
tyrunt.description:
This Pokémon was restored from a fossil.
If something happens that it doesn’t like,
it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

tyrantrum.name: tyrantrum
tyrantrum.description:
The king of the ancient world, it can easily
crunch a car with the devastating strength
of its enormous jaws.

amaura.name: amaura
amaura.description:
This ancient Pokémon was restored
from part of its body that had been
frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

aurorus.name: aurorus
aurorus.description:
The diamond-shaped crystals on its body
expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit,
surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

hawlucha.name: hawlucha
hawlucha.description:
It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile
maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy
finishing move.

dedenne.name: dedenne
dedenne.description:
A Dedenne’s whiskers pick up electrical waves
other Dedenne send out. These Pokémon share
locations of food or electricity with one another.

carbink.name: carbink
carbink.description:
Born from the temperatures and pressures
deep underground, it fires beams from the
stone in its head.

goomy.name: goomy
goomy.description:
Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if
the weather becomes too arid. It’s considered
the weakest dragon Pokémon.

sliggoo.name: sliggoo
sliggoo.description:
Although this Pokémon isn’t very strong, its body
is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through
anything, so predators steer clear of it.

goodra.name: goodra
goodra.description:
Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and
appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers
don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.

klefki.name: klefki
klefki.description:
This Pokémon is constantly collecting keys.
Entrust a Klefki with important keys, and the
Pokémon will protect them no matter what.

phantump.name: phantump
phantump.description:
After a lost child perished in the forest, their
spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit’s
rebirth as this Pokémon.

trevenant.name: trevenant
trevenant.description:
People fear it due to a belief that it devours any
who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the
Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.

pumpkaboo.name: pumpkaboo
pumpkaboo.description:
Spirits that wander this world are placed into
Pumpkaboo’s body. They’re then moved on to
the afterlife.

gourgeist.name: gourgeist
gourgeist.description:
Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of
night. The sounds are said to be the wails of
spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.

bergmite.name: bergmite
bergmite.description:
They chill the air around them to −150 degrees
Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice
that they use as armor.

avalugg.name: avalugg
avalugg.description:
At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found
with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims
among the icebergs.

noibat.name: noibat
noibat.description:
After nightfall, they emerge from the caves they
nest in during the day. Using their ultrasonic
waves, they go on the hunt for ripened fruit.

noivern.name: noivern
noivern.description:
Aggressive and cruel, this Pokémon will ruthlessly
torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.

xerneas.name: xerneas
xerneas.description:
Legends say it can share eternal life.
It slept for a thousand years in the form
of a tree before its revival.

yveltal.name: yveltal
yveltal.description:
When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and
tail feathers spread wide and glow red,
it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

zygarde.name: zygarde
zygarde.description:
When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into
disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

diancie.name: diancie
diancie.description:
A sudden transformation of Carbink,
its pink, glimmering body is said to be
the loveliest sight in the whole world.

hoopa.name: hoopa
hoopa.description:
This troublemaker sends anything
and everything to faraway places
using its loop, which can warp space.

volcanion.name: volcanion
volcanion.description:
It lets out billows of steam and disappears into
the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains
where humans do not tread.

rowlet.name: rowlet
rowlet.description:
At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while
flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet
switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.

dartrix.name: dartrix
dartrix.description:
It throws one knifelike feather after another at its
enemies, and each one precisely strikes a weak
point. These feathers are known as blade quills.

decidueye.name: decidueye
decidueye.description:
As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills
hidden among the feathers of its wings.
Decidueye’s shots never miss.

litten.name: litten
litten.description:
It spends even the smallest amount of downtime
grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers
in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves.

torracat.name: torracat
torracat.description:
In the midst of battle, the fire pouch on
Torracat’s neck rings like a bell and produces
stronger flames than usual.

incineroar.name: incineroar
incineroar.description:
It excels at violent, no-holds-barred battles.
The temperature of the flames that issue from its
navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

popplio.name: popplio
popplio.description:
It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its
opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer
force of their bursting is what deals damage.

brionne.name: brionne
brionne.description:
As if dancing, it artfully dodges the attacks of its
enemies. All the while, it’s busy forming a bunch
of balloons to overwhelm its foes.

primarina.name: primarina
primarina.description:
With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound
like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to
control its water balloons.

pikipek.name: pikipek
pikipek.description:
It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to
drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food
storage and for nesting.

trumbeak.name: trumbeak
trumbeak.description:
It eats berries and stores their seeds in its
beak. When it encounters enemies or prey,
it fires off all the seeds in a burst.

toucannon.name: toucannon
toucannon.description:
When it battles, its beak heats up. The
temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees
Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.

yungoos.name: yungoos
yungoos.description:
With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything.
It did not originally live in Alola but was
imported from another region.

gumshoos.name: gumshoos
gumshoos.description:
When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently
stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing
by nightfall.

grubbin.name: grubbin
grubbin.description:
Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may
flee rather than risk getting caught in its large
mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.

charjabug.name: charjabug
charjabug.description:
While its durable shell protects it from attacks,
Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of
electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.

vikavolt.name: vikavolt
vikavolt.description:
It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it
through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off
in concentrated beams.

crabrawler.name: crabrawler
crabrawler.description:
While guarding its weak points with its pincers,
it looks for an opening and unleashes punches.
When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

crabominable.name: crabominable
crabominable.description:
It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up
on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure
the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.

oricorio.name: oricorio
oricorio.description:
It beats its wings together to create fire.
As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance,
it bathes opponents in intense flames.

cutiefly.name: cutiefly
cutiefly.description:
Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can
find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying
to get some of Gossifleur’s pollen.

ribombee.name: ribombee
ribombee.description:
It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar.
The puffs’ effects depend on the type of
ingredients and how much of each one is used.

rockruff.name: rockruff
rockruff.description:
This Pokémon can bond very strongly with its
Trainer, but it also has a habit of biting. Raising
a Rockruff for a long time can be challenging.

lycanroc.name: lycanroc
lycanroc.description:
This Lycanroc is calm and cautious. The rocks
jutting from its mane are razor sharp.

wishiwashi.name: wishiwashi
wishiwashi.description:
Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by
gathering up into schools that they’re able
to confront opponents.

mareanie.name: mareanie
mareanie.description:
The first symptom of its sting is numbness.
The next is an itching sensation so intense that it’s
impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.

toxapex.name: toxapex
toxapex.description:
To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this
Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing
its body so it can capture its own body heat.

mudbray.name: mudbray
mudbray.description:
Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its
own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon.
It’s skilled at making use of mud.

mudsdale.name: mudsdale
mudsdale.description:
Mud that hardens around a Mudsdale’s legs
sets harder than stone. It’s so hard that it allows
this Pokémon to scrap a truck with a single kick.

dewpider.name: dewpider
dewpider.description:
It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body
and then covers its head with it. Meeting another
Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.

araquanid.name: araquanid
araquanid.description:
It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning
prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then
take its time to savor its meal.

fomantis.name: fomantis
fomantis.description:
When bathed in sunlight, this Pokémon emits a
pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug
Pokémon to gather around it.

lurantis.name: lurantis
lurantis.description:
This Pokémon resembles a beautiful flower.
A properly raised Lurantis will have gorgeous,
brilliant colors.

morelull.name: morelull
morelull.description:
Pokémon living in the forest eat the
delicious caps on Morelull’s head.
The caps regrow overnight.

shiinotic.name: shiinotic
shiinotic.description:
Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to
sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing,
it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

salandit.name: salandit
salandit.description:
Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this
Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail.
This process creates Salandit’s poisonous gas.

salazzle.name: salazzle
salazzle.description:
Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden
with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.

stufful.name: stufful
stufful.description:
Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly
reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result
in painful retaliation.

bewear.name: bewear
bewear.description:
Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show
its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is
dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.

bounsweet.name: bounsweet
bounsweet.description:
Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is
extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.

steenee.name: steenee
steenee.description:
As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads
out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will
feel a surge of happiness.

tsareena.name: tsareena
tsareena.description:
This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and
a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on
its opponents.

comfey.name: comfey
comfey.description:
Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates
itself with them. For some reason, flowers won’t
wither once they’re attached to a Comfey.

oranguru.name: oranguru
oranguru.description:
With waves of its fan—made from leaves and its
own fur—Oranguru skillfully gives instructions to
other Pokémon.

passimian.name: passimian
passimian.description:
Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the
orders of their boss as they all help out in the
search for their favorite berries.

wimpod.name: wimpod
wimpod.description:
It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and
everything, including garbage and rotten things.
The ground near its nest is always clean.

golisopod.name: golisopod
golisopod.description:
It will do anything to win, taking advantage of
every opening and finishing opponents off with
the small claws on its front legs.

sandygast.name: sandygast
sandygast.description:
Grudges of the dead have possessed a mound of
sand and become a Pokémon. Sandygast is fond
of the shovel on its head.

palossand.name: palossand
palossand.description:
Palossand is known as the Beach Nightmare. It
pulls its prey down into the sand by controlling
the sand itself, and then it sucks out their souls.

pyukumuku.name: pyukumuku
pyukumuku.description:
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a
foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means
to punch them.

type-null.name: type-null
type-null.description:
Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research
notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon
being created in the Galar region.

silvally.name: silvally
silvally.description:
A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and
its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within
Silvally. It can change its type at will.

minior.name: minior
minior.description:
Originally making its home in the ozone layer,
it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing
its body grows too heavy.

komala.name: komala
komala.description:
It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its
movements are apparently no more than the
results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

turtonator.name: turtonator
turtonator.description:
Explosive substances coat the shell on its back.
Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away
by an immense detonation.

togedemaru.name: togedemaru
togedemaru.description:
With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon
takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon.
It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

mimikyu.name: mimikyu
mimikyu.description:
It wears a rag fashioned into a Pikachu costume
in an effort to look less scary. Unfortunately,
the costume only makes it creepier.

bruxish.name: bruxish
bruxish.description:
When it unleashes its psychic power from the
protuberance on its head, the grating sound
of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

drampa.name: drampa
drampa.description:
The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles
in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play
with the children living in the towns below.

dhelmise.name: dhelmise
dhelmise.description:
After a piece of seaweed merged with debris
from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this
ghost Pokémon.

jangmo-o.name: jangmo-o
jangmo-o.description:
They learn to fight by smashing their head scales
together. The dueling strengthens both their skills
and their spirits.

hakamo-o.name: hakamo-o
hakamo-o.description:
The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are
signs of its strength. It shows them off to
defeated opponents.

kommo-o.name: kommo-o
kommo-o.description:
It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents.
This Pokémon will battle only those who stand
steadfast in the face of this display.

tapu-koko.name: tapu-koko
tapu-koko.description:
This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with
curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores
their lightning inside its body.

tapu-lele.name: tapu-lele
tapu-lele.description:
This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel.
The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of
its energy.

tapu-bulu.name: tapu-bulu
tapu-bulu.description:
It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings
them around. It causes vegetation to grow,
and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

tapu-fini.name: tapu-fini
tapu-fini.description:
The dense fog it creates brings the downfall
and destruction of its confused enemies.
Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

cosmog.name: cosmog
cosmog.description:
This Pokémon came from another universe.
Its gaseous body is so light that even a gentle
breeze can blow it away.

cosmoem.name: cosmoem
cosmoem.description:
The absorption of starlight fuels this Pokémon’s
growth. The shell that encases it is harder than
any known material.

solgaleo.name: solgaleo
solgaleo.description:
When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon
could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel
any darkness and light up the world.

lunala.name: lunala
lunala.description:
Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this
Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and
converting it into its own energy.

nihilego.name: nihilego
nihilego.description:
One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People
on the street report observing those infested
by it suddenly becoming violent.

buzzwole.name: buzzwole
buzzwole.description:
This Ultra Beast appeared from another world.
It shows off its body, but whether that display
is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

pheromosa.name: pheromosa
pheromosa.description:
One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been
spotted running across the land at
terrific speeds.

xurkitree.name: xurkitree
xurkitree.description:
It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a
power plant, so people think it energizes itself
with electricity.

celesteela.name: celesteela
celesteela.description:
It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses
observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

kartana.name: kartana
kartana.description:
This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole.
It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but
its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

guzzlord.name: guzzlord
guzzlord.description:
It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole
buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the
Ultra Beasts.

necrozma.name: necrozma
necrozma.description:
It survives by absorbing light. After a long time
spent slumbering underground, impurities
accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.

magearna.name: magearna
magearna.description:
This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than
500 years ago, can understand human speech
but cannot itself speak.

marshadow.name: marshadow
marshadow.description:
By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts
master and copying their movements, this
Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.

poipole.name: poipole
poipole.description:
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be
chosen as a first partner in its own world.

naganadel.name: naganadel
naganadel.description:
It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid
inside its body. It is one of the organisms known
as UBs.

stakataka.name: stakataka
stakataka.description:
It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one
appears to be made up of many life-forms
stacked one on top of each other.

blacephalon.name: blacephalon
blacephalon.description:
It slithers toward people. Then, without warning,
it triggers the explosion of its own head.
It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

zeraora.name: zeraora
zeraora.description:
It runs as fast as lightning strikes, shredding its
opponents with its high-voltage claws.
